migrations.description: Removes the legacy cache configuration from nx.json
migrations.name: remove-legacy-cache

migrations.description: Removes the legacy cache configuration from nx.json
migrations.name: remove-custom-tasks-runner

migrations.description: Updates release version config based on the breaking changes in Nx v21
migrations.name: release-version-config-changes

migrations.description: Updates release changelog config based on the breaking changes in Nx v21
migrations.name: release-changelog-config-changes

migrations.description: Updates release version config based on the breaking changes in Nx v22
migrations.name: 22-0-0-release-version-config-changes

migrations.description: Consolidates releaseTag* options into nested releaseTag object structure
migrations.name: 22-0-0-consolidate-release-tag-config

migrations.description: Updates the nx wrapper.
migrations.name: 22-1-0-update-nx-wrapper

migrations.description: Migrate the legacy 'development' custom condition to a workspace-unique custom condition name.
migrations.name: migrate-development-custom-condition

migrations.description: Remove the deprecated `external` and `externalBuildTargets` options from the `@nx/js:swc` and `@nx/js:tsc` executors.
migrations.name: remove-external-options-from-js-executors

migrations.description: Removes redundant TypeScript project references from project's tsconfig.json files when runtime tsconfig files (e.g., tsconfig.lib.json, tsconfig.app.json) exist.
migrations.name: remove-redundant-ts-project-references

migrations.description: Update TypeScript ESLint packages to v8.13.0 if they are already on v8
migrations.name: update-typescript-eslint-v8.13.0

migrations.description: Update ESLint flat config to include .cjs, .mjs, .cts, and .mts files in overrides (if needed)
migrations.name: add-file-extensions-to-overrides

migrations.description: Install jiti as a devDependency to allow vite to parse TS postcss files.
migrations.name: update-20-5-0-install-jiti

migrations.description: Update resolve.conditions to include defaults that are no longer provided by Vite.
migrations.name: update-20-5-0-update-resolve-conditions

migrations.description: Add vite config temporary files to the ESLint configuration ignore patterns if ESLint is used.
migrations.name: eslint-ignore-vite-temp-files

migrations.description: Migrate Vitest usage from @nx/vite to @nx/vitest package.
migrations.name: migrate-vitest-to-vitest-package

migrations.description: Replace usage of `getJestProjects` with `getJestProjectsAsync`.
migrations.name: replace-getJestProjects-with-getJestProjectsAsync-v21

migrations.description: Remove the previously deprecated and unused `tsConfig` option from the `@nx/jest:jest` executor.
migrations.name: remove-tsconfig-option-from-jest-executor

migrations.description: Rename the CLI option `testPathPattern` to `testPathPatterns`.
migrations.name: rename-test-path-pattern

migrations.description: Replace removed matcher aliases in Jest v30 with their corresponding matcher
migrations.name: replace-removed-matcher-aliases

migrations.description: Convert jest.config.ts files from ESM to CJS syntax (export default -> module.exports, import -> require) for projects using CommonJS resolution to ensure correct loading under Node.js type-stripping.
migrations.name: convert-jest-config-to-cjs

migrations.description: Replace removed matcher aliases in Jest v30 with their corresponding matcher
migrations.name: replace-removed-matcher-aliases-v22-3

migrations.description: Update the ModuleFederationConfig import use @nx/module-federation.
migrations.name: update-20-2-0-update-module-federation-config-import

migrations.description: Update the withModuleFederation import use @nx/module-federation/webpack.
migrations.name: update-20-2-0-update-with-module-federation-import

migrations.description: If workspace includes Module Federation projects, ensure the new @nx/module-federation package is installed.
migrations.name: ensure-nx-module-federation-package

migrations.description: Add NX_MF_DEV_REMOTES to inputs for task hashing when '@nx/webpack:webpack' or '@nx/rspack:rspack' is used for Module Federation.
migrations.name: add-mf-env-var-to-target-defaults

migrations.description: Replaces `classProperties.loose` option with `loose`.
migrations.name: update-21-0-0-update-babel-loose

migrations.description: Updates webpack configs using React to use the new withSvgr composable function instead of the svgr option in withReact or NxReactWebpackPlugin.
migrations.name: update-22-0-0-add-svgr-to-webpack-config
